name: Whack a Food (School "Fix-It" Project)
description:
This game was created from a starter file where I had to fix bugs to make it run correctly.

Challenge from : https://learn.unity.com/tutorial/challenge-5-whack-a-food-with-wacky-ui?uv=2020....

Goal:

Click as much food as you can within the allotted time period to score points! Clicking Skulls loses you points. When the timer hits 0, the game ends.

Controls:

Left Mouse button to click food.
